reviewText:
I love it. It's stupid simple.

If I ever need to use it I'm really sure I can defend myself using this.

Good product. Second time buying it

If I could give zero stars I would. This guy is a fake plain and simple and his material is weak. I am a retired Army Special Forces officer and "Captain" Chris has been on our list of frauds for a very longtime. If the "Captain" happens to read this I'd invite him to try his techniques on this 52 year old combat vet and see who's left standing. Don't waste your time or money. If you're in doubt Google this guy and you'll find out the truth.
Not bad.  Of course I haven't tested it yet in a real situation.

I am experienced in Shotokan karate and judo and I can say that the close combat training which is based on the 2nd world war training given to the SOE in the British army before they were dropped into enemy terratory as a means of dealing with the Nazis without shooting them and making a noise. It is simple and on the street as a method of self defence it is absolutely devastating.
